summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 3rd Avenue North from Aloha Street to the north line of Woodward's Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and steps, sewers and grading the ungraded parts of the street, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 34231 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
